1.name: ARTICLE III. - APPOINTMENT AND REMOVAL OF OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES; INTEREST OF OFFICIALS IN CONTRACTS
1.label: article

full_text: Every officer, agent, employee and assistant of the City government (except the Mayor and members of the City Council whose salaries are otherwise provided for), shall receive such salary or compensation as the City Council shall by budget appropriation or other appropriate action provide, payable in equal semi-monthly installments, unless the City Council shall order payments to be made at other intervals.

0.text: Every officer, agent, employee and assistant of the City government (except the Mayor and members of the City Council whose salaries are otherwise provided for), shall receive such salary or compensation as the City Council shall by budget appropriation or other appropriate action provide, payable in equal semi-monthly installments, unless the City Council shall order payments to be made at other intervals.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

SALARIES. (§ I-III-3.7)

Every officer, agent, employee and assistant of the City government (except the
Mayor and members of the City Council whose salaries are otherwise provided
for), shall receive such salary or compensation as the City Council shall by
budget appropriation or other appropriate action provide, payable in equal
semi-monthly installments, unless the City Council shall order payments to be
made at other intervals.
